segments.text: I'm observing the two children, and they are quite a pair.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously balanced on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, eagerly awaiting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic secret cookie raid, right out of a storybook.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the 'COOKIE JAR' label very clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in there, grabbing what he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it could tip at any second, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm worried he might fall and hurt himself or break the plate he's holding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His dedication to the cookie mission is admirable, really.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's raised hand shows pure anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their prize, just like the woman is on her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mischievous duo, working together so well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught or, worse, tumble down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is a minefield of potential domestic drama.
segments.speaker: PAR
